0: Facilities was good Executive Lounge was friendly Pool and Gym was beautiful and well equip
This hotel was beautiful with a great pool that provides a great view
The pool is fantastic and unlike a lot of other hotel pools in the neighborhood actually gets a lot of sunlight
The pool and facilities are beautiful
The pool is beautiful on the 4th floor in a park like setting with masses of flowers and potted plants everywhere
Nice view of the pool and city which does not make up for the small bed
Pool is clean and serene and nice gymnasium
Pool area is one of the best in Bangkok just needs renowation soon
Our room had a bowl of fruit placed on the table upon arrival and we were able to use the pool after our check out time because we had an evening flight
The rooms were wonderful with the softest bed ever and the pool was stunning
1: A part from the unavailable swimming pool which was under reconstruction no complaints whatsoever but on the other hand a hotel has to renovate to stay updated so surely future guests will enjoy the advantage
2: There is an outside pool giving you the option to get an hour in the sun if you have time during your visit
The swimming pool is not large but still sizable for a downtown hotel
The swimming pool was the nicest area although water was on the cold side despite a very hot day
The pool area is beautiful but the water is not very clean
it is got a decent size like 20 m length pool which you could easily do 10 laps
The one significant down side for us is the service and facilities at the pool and gym which feel like they belong to a different lower grade hotel

At the polside we were also disturbed by cooking smells from the kitchens and by cigarette smoke from other guests using the sunbeds around the polit is understandable that Hotel management might make room comfort and income generating facilities such as restaurants etc their priority and certainly the recent refurbishment of these spaces has been a triumph
The pool is ok size for a city centre hotel bigger that what it seems in the pictures
Not “ cosy ” enough for my taste but I felt safe and the pool was a bonus
The swimming pool is very dirty too
